{showBillAmtError ? "Please enter a valid bill amount" : ""}

setBillAmt(+e.target.value)} // value={billAmt} />

{showDinersError ? "Please enter whole numbers only" : ""}

setDiners(+e.target.value)} />
); }; export default Form;
